trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the aarakocra is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage to the target.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The aarakocra doesn't provoke an {@action opportunity attack} when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The aarakocra makes three melee attacks: one with its javelin and two with its talons, or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Talon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the aarakocra is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to the target.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The aarakocra has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The aarakocra makes two melee attacks: one with its javelin and one with its talon, or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Talon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The aarakocra is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the aarakocra is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to the target.

trait.name: Fury of Syranita
entries: As a bonus action, the aarakocra can expend a spell slot to cause its melee or ranged weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 13 ({@damage 3d8}) lightning or thunder damage to a target on a hit. This beneft lasts until the end of the turn. If the aarakora expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each level above 1st (maximum {@dice 6d8}).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The aarakocra makes two melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Talon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The aboleth's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 19}). The aboleth can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The aboleth can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the aboleth fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Mucous Cloud
entries: While underwater, the aboleth is surrounded by transformative mucus. A creature that touches the aboleth or that hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature is diseased for {@dice 1d4} hours. The diseased creature can breathe only underwater.

trait.name: Probing Telepathy
entries: If a creature communicates telepathically with the aboleth, the aboleth learns the creature's greatest desires if the aboleth can see the creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The aboleth makes four tentacle attacks.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or become diseased. The disease has no effect for 1 minute and can be removed by any magic that cures disease. After 1 minute, the diseased creature's skin becomes translucent and slimy, the creature can't regain hit points unless it is underwater, and the disease can be removed only by {@spell heal} or another disease-curing spell of 6th level or higher. When the creature is outside a body of water, it takes 6 ({@damage 1d12}) acid damage every 10 minutes unless moisture is applied to the skin before 10 minutes have passed.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Enslave (3/Day)
entries: The aboleth targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed} by the aboleth until the aboleth dies or until it is on a different plane of existence from the target. The {@condition charmed} target is under the aboleth's control and can't take reactions, and the aboleth and the target can communicate telepathically with each other over any distance.

Whenever the {@condition charmed} target takes damage, the target can repeat the saving throw. On a success, the effect ends. No more than once every 24 hours, the target can also repeat the saving throw when it is at least 1 mile away from the aboleth.

action.name: Fling
entries: One Large or smaller object held or creature {@condition grappled} by the aboleth is thrown up to 60 feet and knocked {@condition prone}. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. If the aboleth uses multiattack, it can use its Fling in place of one of its tentacle attacks.

legendary.name: Enslave
entries: The aboleth uses its Enslave feature.

legendary.name: Tail Swipe
entries: The aboleth makes one tail attack.

legendary.name: Psychic Drain (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: One creature {@condition charmed} by the aboleth takes 28 ({@damage 8d6}) psychic damage, and the aboleth regains hit points equal to the damage the creature takes.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The aboleth casts a spell from its list of innate spells, using a spell slot as normal.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The aboleth can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Acidic Mucous Cloud
entries: While underwater, the aboleth is surrounded by transformative mucus. A creature that touches the aboleth or that hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage and must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, the creature is diseased for {@dice 1d4} hours. The diseased creature can breathe only underwater.

trait.name: Probing Telepathy
entries: If a creature communicates telepathically with the aboleth, the aboleth learns the creature's greatest desires if the aboleth can see the creature.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The aboleth makes three tentacle attacks. Alternatively, it can use two slime orb attacks.

action.name: Slime Orb
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 11} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} until the end of the aboleth's next turn.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or become diseased. The disease has no effect for 1 minute and can be removed by any magic that cures disease. After 1 minute, the diseased creature's skin becomes translucent and slimy, the creature can't regain hit points unless it is underwater, and the disease can be removed only by {@spell heal} or another disease-curing spell of 6th level or higher. When the creature is outside a body of water, it takes 6 ({@damage 1d12}) acid damage every 10 minutes unless moisture is applied to the skin before 10 minutes have passed.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Enslave (3/Day)
entries: The aboleth targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed} by the aboleth until the aboleth dies or until it is on a different plane of existence from the target. The {@condition charmed} target is under the aboleth's control and can't take reactions, and the aboleth and the target can communicate telepathically with each other over any distance.

Whenever the {@condition charmed} target takes damage, the target can repeat the saving throw. On a success, the effect ends. No more than once every 24 hours, the target can also repeat the saving throw when it is at least 1 mile away from the aboleth.

legendary.name: Tail Swipe
entries: The aboleth makes one tail attack.

legendary.name: Psychic Drain (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: One creature {@condition charmed} by the aboleth takes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) psychic damage, and the aboleth regains hit points equal to the damage the creature takes.

legendary.name: Slime Sphere (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The aboleth conjures a ball of acidic slime that explodes at a point it can see within 120 feet of it.

Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage and is {@condition restrained}, or half as much damage and isn't {@condition restrained} on a successful one. A {@condition restrained} creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the Aboleth's turns. A {@condition restrained} creature can use an action to perform a {@dc 16} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) or Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The adept of Orcus is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Turning Defance
entries: The adept of Orcus and any ghouls within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The adept of Orcus attacks two times: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, range 5 ft., one creature. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skeleton can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the skeleton's choice that is within 120 feet of the skeleton and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the skeleton's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The skeleton makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The skeleton makes a tail attack

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The skeleton swings and strikes with its skeletal appendages that used to hold its wing membrane. Each creature within 15 feet of the skeleton must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Turning Defance
entries: The agarat and any ghouls within 30 feet of it have advantage on saving throws against effects that turn undead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The agarat attacks two times: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 5 ft., one creature. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 5 ft., one creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Horrid Scream {@recharge 5}
entries: The agarat can emit a bloodcurdling, supernatural scream. Each creature within 30 feet that can hear its scream takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage and must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature will have its hit point maximum reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

trait.name: Air Form
entries: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Tornado {@recharge 4}
entries: The elemental magically transforms into a violent tornado and moves up to half its flying speed in a straight line and targets each creature its space it enters. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 26 ({@damage 5d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and is flung up 30 feet away from the elemental in a random direction and knocked {@condition prone}. If a thrown target strikes an object, such as a wall or floor, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. If the saving throw is successful, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't flung away or knocked {@condition prone}. The air elemental reverts to its true form at the end of the turn.

trait.name: Air Form
entries: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The elemental makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Whirlwind {@recharge 4}
entries: Each creature in the elemental's space must succeed on a {@dc 10} Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage and is flung up 10 feet away from the elemental in a random direction and knocked {@condition prone}.

If a thrown target strikes an object, such as a wall or floor, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. If the saving throw is successful, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't flung away or knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the behir fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The behir makes three attacks: one with its bite, one to constrict, and one with its tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) percing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Huge or smaller creature. {@h}24 ({@damage 3d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage plus 24 ({@damage 3d10 + 8}) slashing damage. The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 18}) if the behir isn't already constricting a creature, and the target is {@condition restrained} until this grapple ends.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The behir exhales a line of lightning that is 40 feet long and 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 82 ({@damage 15d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The behir makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the target is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the behir, and it takes 28 ({@damage 8d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the behir's turns. A behir can have only up to one Large or two Medium creatures swallowed at a time.

If the behir takes 40 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the behir must succeed on a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the behir. If the behir dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The behir makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The behir moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Tail
entries: The behir makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The behir makes a bite attack.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the ancient blight remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal dead or leafless ancient tree.

trait.name: Grasping Roots
entries: The ancient blight can have up to six root tendrils at a time. Each root tendril can be attacked (AC 15; 10 hit points).

Destroying a root tendril deals no damage to the ancient blight, but reduces its number of root tendrils. A root tendril can also be broken if a creature takes an action and succeeds on a {@dc 17} Strength check against it. A lost root tendril regrows after 24 hours.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The ancient blight deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ancient blight makes six attacks: four with its root tendrils and two with its slam.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Root Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 20 ft., one creature. {@h}The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until the grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the ancient blight can't use the same root tendril on another target.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The naga is a 10th-level spellcaster (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks) that needs only verbal components to cast its spells.
If the naga was a guardian naga in life , its spellcasting ability is Wisdom, and it has the following cleric spells prepared:
footerEntries: If the naga was a spirit naga in life , its spellcasting ability is Intelligence, and it has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The naga has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The naga makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

legendary.name: Tail
entries: The naga makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The naga makes a bite attack.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The naga casts a spell from its list of innate spells, using a spell slot as normal.

trait.name: Three-Headed
entries: The chimera has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chimera makes four attacks: one with its lion head's bite, one with its dragon head's bite, one with its horns, and one with its claws. When its fire breath is available, it can use the breath in place of its dragons head's bite.

action.name: Dragon Head's Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) percing damage plus 4 ({@dice 1d8}) fire.

action.name: Lion Head's Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) percing damage.

action.name: Horns
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon head exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 63 ({@damage 14d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The chimera makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The chimera moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Tail
entries: The chimera makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Lion's Roar (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The chimera's lion head emits a magical roar. Each creature within 120 feet that can hear its roar must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or be and {@condition frightened} for one minute. If a creature fails its saving throw by 5 or more, the creature is also {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition frightened} for the same duration. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the Lion's Roar the next 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skeleton can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the skeleton's choice that is within 120 feet of the skeleton and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the skeleton's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The skeleton makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Tail Attack
entries: The skeleton makes a tail attack

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The skeleton swings and strikes with its skeletal appendages that used to hold its wing membrane. Each creature within 15 feet of the skeleton must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw or take 15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The naga is a 15th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks) and it needs only verbal components to cast its spells. It has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The naga has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If it dies, the naga returns to life in {@dice 1d6} days and regains all its hit points. Only a wish spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The naga makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail. It can replace a bite attack with Spit Poison.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 54 ({@damage 12d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Spit Poison
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 20 ft./40 ft., one target. {@h}The target must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 54 ({@damage 12d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

legendary.name: Tail
entries: The naga makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The naga makes a bite attack.

legendary.name: Spit Poison (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The naga uses Spit Poison.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The naga casts a spell from its list of innate spells, using a spell slot as normal.

trait.name: Burst Forth (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The remorhaz breaks through solid ground or wall as a bonus action, showering the area with debris. Each creature within 15 feet of the remorhaz that is surprised must succeed on a {@dc 23} Strength check, taking 33 ({@damage 7d6 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save, or half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone} on a successful one.

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the remorhaz or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}58 ({@damage 9d10 + 9}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage. If the target is a creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 19}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the remorhaz can't bite another target.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The remorhaz makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, that creature takes the bite's damage and is swallowed, and the grapple ends . While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the remorhaz, and it takes 28 ({@damage 8d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the remorhaz's turns.

If the remorhaz takes 40 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the remorhaz must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the remorhaz. If the remorhaz dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 20 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the roper remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal cave formation, such as a stalagmite.

trait.name: Grasping Tendrils
entries: The roper can have up to six tendrils at a time. Each tendril can be attacked (AC 21; 20 hit points). Destroying a tendril deals no damage to the roper, but reduces its number of tendrils. A tendril can also be broken if a creature takes an action and succeeds on a {@dc 17} Strength check against it. A lost tendril regrows after 24 hours.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The roper has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The roper can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The roper makes six attacks with its tendrils, uses Reel, and makes one attack with its bite.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}33 ({@damage 6d8 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until the grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, has disadvantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws, and takes 5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of the roper's turns, and the roper can't use the same tendril on another target.

action.name: Reel
entries: The roper pulls each creature {@condition grappled} by it up to 30 feet straight toward it.

trait.name: Lightning Absorption
entries: Whenever the shambling mound is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shambling mound makes two slam attacks. If both attacks hit a Medium or smaller target, the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}), and the shambling mound uses its Engulf on it.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Engulf
entries: The shambling mound engulfs a Medium or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by it. The engulfed target is {@condition blinded}, {@condition restrained}, and unable to breathe, and it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw at the start of each of the mound's turns or take 19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage. If the mound moves, the engulfed target moves with it. The mound can have up to two creatures engulfed at a time.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The naga is a 14th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks) and it needs only verbal components to cast its spells. It has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The naga has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If it dies, the naga returns to life in {@dice 1d6} days and regains all its hit points. Only a wish spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The naga makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 40 ({@damage 9d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

legendary.name: Tail
entries: The naga makes a tail attack.

legendary.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The naga makes a bite attack.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The naga casts a spell from its list of innate spells, using a spell slot as normal.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wyvern makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its stinger. While flying, it can use its claws in place of one other attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) piercing damage. The target must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The wyvern makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

legendary.name: Bite
entries: The wyvern makes a bite attack.

legendary.name: Sting (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The wyvern attacks with its stinger.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The wyvern beats its wings. Each creature within 15 feet of the wyvern must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The wyvern can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries: The statue is {@condition incapacitated} while in the area of an antimagic feld. If targeted by {@spell dispel magic}, the statue must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the statue remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal statue.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The statue makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries: The statue is {@condition incapacitated} while in the area of an antimagic feld. If targeted by {@spell dispel magic}, the statue must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the statue remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal statue.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The statue makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries: The statue is {@condition incapacitated} while in the area of an antimagic feld. If targeted by {@spell dispel magic}, the statue must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the statue remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal statue.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The statue makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Lay Egg
entries: As a bonus action, the brood queen can lay an egg that contains an ankheg broodling. The egg appears in the nearest space within 5 feet of the brood queen. The egg has an of AC 5 and has 5 hit points. At the end of the brood queen's next turn, the ankheg broodling can use a bonus action to break out of its egg and immediately move and attack the nearest creature that isn't an ankheg.

trait.name: Burst Forth (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The brood queen breaks through solid ground or wall as a bonus action, showering the area with debris. Each creature within 15 feet of the brood queen that is surprised must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength check, taking 20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save, or half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone} on a successful one.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The brood queen makes two melee attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@dice 2d6}) acid. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until this grapple ends, the brood queen can bite only the {@condition grappled} creature and has advantage on attack rolls to do so.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Command Ankhegs
entries: The brood queen targets {@dice 1d4} ankhegs within 30 feet that can see and hear the brood queen. The target uses its reaction to make one melee attack.

action.name: Acid Spray {@recharge 5}
entries: The brood queen spits acid in a line that is 60 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) slashing damage plus 2 ({@dice 1d4}) acid.

action.name: Acid Spray {@recharge}
entries: The broodling spits acid in a line that is 15 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw, taking 5 ({@damage 2d4}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Three-Headed
entries: The ankhimera has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ankhimera makes three attacks: one with its ankheg head's bite, one with its dragon head's bite, and one with its horns. When its acid spray is available, it can use the acid spray in place of its ankheg head's bite. When its cold breath is available, it can use the cold breath in place of its dragon head's bite. However, it can't use both acid spray and cold breath on the same turn.

action.name: Ankheg Head's Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) percing damage plus 3 ({@dice 1d6}) acid. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}).
Until this grapple ends, the ankheg head can bite only the {@condition grappled} creature and has advantage on attack rolls to do so.

action.name: Dragon Head's Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) percing damage plus 4 ({@dice 1d8}) cold.

action.name: Horns
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Acid Spray {@recharge}
entries: The ankheg head spits acid in a line that is 30 feet long and 5 feet wide, provided that it has no creature {@condition grappled}. Each creature in that line must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one

action.name: Cold Breath {@recharge}
entries: The dragon head exhales cold in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 ({@damage 7d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The arcane guard is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following sorcerer spells prepared:

trait.name: Sorcery Points
entries: The arcane guard has 5 sorcery points. It can spend 1 or more sorcery points as a bonus action to gain one of the following benefits:

Empowered Spell: When the arcane guard rolls damage for a spell, it can spend 1 sorcery point to reroll up to 3 damage dice. It must use the new rolls. It can use Empowered Spell even if it has already used a different Metamagic option during the casting of the spell.
Quickened Spell: When the arcane guard casts a spell that has a casting time of 1 action, the giant can spend 2 sorcery points to change the casting time to 1 bonus action for this casting.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The arcane knight is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following sorcerer spells prepared:

trait.name: Brave
entries: The knight has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Sorcery Points
entries: The arcane knight has 7 sorcery points. It can spend 1 or more sorcery points as a bonus action to gain one of the following benefits:

Empowered Spell: When the arcane knight rolls damage for a spell, it can spend 1 sorcery point to reroll up to 3 damage dice. It must use the new rolls. It can use Empowered Spell even if it has already used a different Metamagic option during the casting of the spell.
Quickened Spell: When the arcane knight casts a spell that has a casting time of 1 action, the giant can spend 2 sorcery points to change the casting time to 1 bonus action for this casting.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The arcane knight makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The arcane knight adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the arcane knight must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The azer is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Extra Heated Weapons
entries: When the azer hits with a metal melee weapon, it deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the azer or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The azer sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The azer makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

reaction.name: Fiery Retribution (3/day)
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the azer hits the azer with an attack, and the azer can see the creature, the azer can force the creature to make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) fire damage on a failed saving throw, and half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Aura of Tyranny
entries: An ally that is within 30 feet of the azer and can see and hear the azer and has less hit points than the azer has advantage to saving throws against being {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Extra Heated Weapons
entries: When the azer hits with a metal melee weapon, it deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the azer or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The azer sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

trait.name: Spur Ally
entries: As a bonus action, the azer targets an allied creature within 30 feet that can see and hear the azer and must have less hit points than the azer. The target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage and uses its reaction to make one melee attack with advantage on the roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The azer makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it also catches fire.

trait.name: Extra Heated Weapons
entries: When the azer hits with a metal melee weapon, it deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage (included in the attack).

trait.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the azer or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The azer sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

trait.name: Divine Fury (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the azer can magically infuse its attacks with divine energy. For 1 minute, the first creature the azer hits on each of its turns with a weapon attack takes 8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) radiant damage.

trait.name: Zealous Presence (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the azer unleashes a battle cry infused with divine energy. Up to ten other creatures of its choice within 60 feet of it that can hear it gain advantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The azer makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The baernoloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}). The baernoloth can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The baernoloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The baernoloth's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Pain Echo (1/Turn)
entries: As a bonus action, the baernoloth targets one creature within 60 feet. The target takes psychic damage equal to the amount of damage it took from the baernoloth's last melee attack that hit it within the past 24 hours and must make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of the baernoloth's next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The baernoloth makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or have its hit point maximum reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. The target dies if this attack reduces its hit point maximum to 0. The reduction lasts until removed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The baernoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

action.name: Mass Pain Echo {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature within 60 feet of the baernoloth takes psychic damage equal to the amount of damage it took from the baernoloth's last melee attack that hit it within the past 24 hours and must make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of the baernoloth's next turn.

legendary.name: Claw
entries: The baernoloth makes a claw attack.

legendary.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The baernoloth makes a bite attack.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The baernoloth magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The baernoloth casts a spell from its list of innate spells, using a spell slot as normal.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The balor's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 21}). The balor can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Death Throes
entries: When the balor dies, it explodes, and each creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw, taking 70 ({@damage 20d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion ignites flammable objects in that area that aren't being worn or carried, and it destroys the balor's weapons.

trait.name: Fire Aura
entries: At the start of each of the balor's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature that touches the balor or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The demon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The balor's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The balor can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes two attacks: one with its longsword and one with its whip.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) slashing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) lightning damage. If the balor scores a critical hit, it rolls damage dice three times, instead of twice.

action.name: Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 23} Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 25 feet toward the balor.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the balor's choice that is within 120 feet of the balor and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the balor's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Meteor Strike (1/Day)
entries: While flying, the balor lord dives at least 40 feet toward a target space on the ground, creating a massive explosion 60 feet in diameter centered on the balor. This sprays rock and fire in all directions and forms a crater the size of the explosion.

Each creature within 30 feet of the target space must succeed on a {@dc 21} Strength saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) fire damage and 28 ({@damage 8d6}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save, or half as much damage and is not knocked {@condition prone} on a successful one. Additionally, the ground in that area becomes difficult terrain is engulfed in flames for ten minutes. A creature that starts its turn in the area while it is still in flames takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage. Each 5-foot-square portion of the area requires at least 30 minutes to clear by hand.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The balor magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The balor moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Whip
entries: The balor makes a whip attack.

legendary.name: Longsword (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The balor makes a longsword attack.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The balor magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The balor casts a spell from its list of innate spells, using a spell slot as normal.

legendary.name: Infernal Blast Wave (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Infernal fire erupts and surges from the balor, striking creatures around it. Each creature within 20 feet of the balor must succeed on a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage and 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage and catches fire. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and doesn't catch fire.

monster.name: Baneguard Skeleton
languages: understands all languages it knew in life but can't speak

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The skeleton's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 11}). The skeleton can innately cast the following spells, requiring no spell components:

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage.

monster.name: Banelich

immune.note: from nonmagical weapons

languages: Common plus up to two other languages

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The lich is a 17th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 19}, {@hit 11} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the lich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If it has a phylactery, a destroyed lich gains a new body in {@dice 1d10} days, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: The lich has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lich makes two coldfire attacks.

action.name: Paralyzing Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute.
The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Coldfire
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 11} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Grasp of Death (1/Day)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or its hit points drop to 0. On a success, a creature takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) psychic damage.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: The lich casts a cantrip.

legendary.name: Coldfire
entries: The lich uses its Coldfire.

legendary.name: Paralyzing Touch (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The lich uses its Paralyzing

legendary.name: Painwrack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The lich fxes its gaze on one creature it can see within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw against this magic or take 16 ({@damage 3d10}) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. The {@condition stunned} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition stunned}. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the lich's gaze for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Disrupt Life (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Each living creature within 20 feet of the lich must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The banshee is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Detect Life
entries: The banshee can magically sense the presence of living creatures up to 5 miles away. She knows the general direction they're in but not their exact locations.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The banshee can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. She takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if she ends her turn inside an object.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The banshee can use its Dreadful Visage and then use Life Drain. It can use Kiss of Death in place of Life Drain.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: {@atk ms} + {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}25 ({@damage 6d6 + 4}) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Dreadful Visage
entries: Each non-undead creature within 60 feet of the banshee that can see her must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. If the initial saving throw fails by 5 or more, the creature is {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition frightened} in this way. A {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the banshee is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the banshee's Dreadful Visage for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Kiss of Death
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, or {@condition incapacitated} male humanoid creature. {@h}The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw. On failed save, the target's hit points is reduced to 0. On a success, the creature takes 25 ({@damage 6d6 + 4}) necrotic damage and its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Wail (2/day)
entries: The banshee releases a mournful wail, provided that she isn't in sunlight. This wail has no effect on constructs and undead. All other creatures within 60 feet of her that can hear her must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw. On a failure, a creature drops to 0 hit points. On a success, a creature takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) psychic damage.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The banshee up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|phb|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Life Drain (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The banshee uses its Life Drain.

legendary.name: Kiss of Death (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The banshee uses its Kiss of Death.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The banshee casts a spell from its list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

legendary.name: Keening (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The banshee uses its Wail.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The devil's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}). The devil can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Barbed Hide
entries: At the start of each of its turns, the devil deals 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage to any creature grappling it.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's {@sense darkvision}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes three melee attacks: one with its tail and two with its claws. Alternatively, it can use Hurl Flame twice.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead or a construct, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened}. A {@condition frightened} creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself with a success. If the target's saving throw is successful, the target is immune to being {@condition frightened} by the devil's claw for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 7} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it also catches fire.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, the devil can automatically hit the target with its tail, and the devil can't make tail attacks.

reaction.name: Redirect Attack
entries: When a creature the devil can see targets it with an attack, the devil chooses another ally within 5 feet of it. The two swap places, and the chosen ally becomes the target instead.

reaction.name: Directed Strike (2/Day)
entries: When a creature the devil can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll, and the creature can hear the devil, the devil grants advantage to that roll.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The barlgura abductor's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}). The barlgura abductor can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Running Leap
entries: The barlgura abductor's long jump is up to 50 feet and its high jump is up to 25 feet when it has a running start.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The barlgura abductor makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its fists.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12({@dice 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}).

action.name: Teleport (3/Day)
entries: The barlgura abductor magically teleports, along with any creature it is {@condition grappled} with and any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The barlgura's spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 15}). The barlgura can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The barlgura has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the barlgura's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Packmaster
entries: An allied barlgura that starts its turn within 30 feet of this barlgura that can see or hear this barlgura gains Pack Tactics until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Running Leap
entries: The barlgura's long jump is up to 60 feet and its high jump is up to 30 feet when it has a running start.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The barlgura makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its fists. If both fist attacks hit a Huge or smaller creature, the target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or take an extra 17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Petrifying Gaze
entries: If a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the basilisk and the two of them can see each other, the basilisk can force the creature to make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw if the basilisk isn't {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature magically begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is petrifed until freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

A creature that isn't surprised can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If it does so, it can't see the basilisk until the start of its next turn, when it can avert it s eyes again. If it looks at the basilisk in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.
If the basilisk sees its reflection within 30 feet of it in bright light, it mistakes itself for a rival and targets itself with its gaze.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The basilisk makes three melee attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) percing damage plus 10 ({@dice 3d6}) poison.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Poison Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The basilisk exhales poison in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Battle Horror

immune.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The battle horror has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The battle horror's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Spell Immunity
entries: The battle horror is immune to six spells chosen by its creator. Typical immunities include {@spell fireball}, {@spell heat metal}, and {@spell lightning bolt}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The battle horror makes three longsword attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The battle horror adds 4 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the battle horror must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

reaction.name: Spell Reflection
entries: If the battle horror makes a successful saving throw against a spell, or a spell attack misses it, the battle horror can choose another creature (including the spellcaster) it can see within 30 feet of it. The spell targets the chosen creature instead of the battle horror. If the spell forced a saving throw, the chosen creature makes its own save. If the spell was an attack, the attack roll is rerolled against the chosen creature.

trait.name: Battle Frenzy
entries: While it can see an allied creature within 30 feet of it, the bearded devil enforcer gains advantage on Strength checks and saving throws, and all melee weapon attack rolls, but attacks rolls against it have advantage.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's {@sense darkvision}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Steadfast
entries: The devil can't be {@condition frightened} while it can see an allied creature within 30 feet of it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes two attacks: one with its beard and one with its glaive.

action.name: Beard
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. Until this poison ends, the target can't regain hit points. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature other than an undead or a construct, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or lose 5 ({@dice 1d10}) hit points at the start of each of its turns due to an infernal wound. Each time the devil hits the wounded target with thi s attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 5 ({@dice 1d10}). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful {@dc 13} Wisdom ({@skill Medicine}) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The slaad's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 19}). The slaad can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The slaad can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The slaad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The slaad's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The slaad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The slaad makes three attacks: one with its tongue and two with its claws. If both claw attacks hit the same creature, the target takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) slashing damage and must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Chaos Spittle
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}Roll {@dice 1d8} to determine which effect happens:

items: The target takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) fire damage.
The target takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) acid damage.
The target takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) lightning damage.
The target takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) poison damage.
The target takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) cold damage.

The target is {@condition restrained}. It must then make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns. If it successfully saves three times, the spell ends. If it fails its save three times, it permanently turns to stone and is subjected to the {@condition petrified} condition. The successes and failures don't need to be consecutive; keep track of both until the target collects three of a kind.

The target is {@condition blinded}. It must then make a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw at the start of the slaad's next turn. A successful save ends the blindness. If it fails that save, the creature is transported to another plane of existence of the DM's choosing and is no longer {@condition blinded}. (Typically, a creature that is on a plane that isn't its home plane is banished home, while other creatures are usually cast into the Astral or Ethereal planes.)
Two effects. Roll twice more, rerolling any 8.

legendary.name: Tongue
entries: The slaad makes a tongue attack.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The slaad moves up to half its speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|phb|opportunity attacks}.

legendary.name: Chaos Spittle (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The slaad makes an acid spittle attack.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The slaad casts a spell from its list of innate spells, using a spell slot as normal.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The treant's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 17}). The treant can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Aura of Blight
entries: A living creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the treant takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the treant remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal dead tree.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The treant deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The treant makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Rotting Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken. This reduction lasts until the creature finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Animate Dead Trees (1/Day)
entries: The treant magically animates one or two dead trees it can see within 60 feet of it. These dead trees have the same statistics as a normal treant, except they have Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, they can't speak, and they have only the

Slam action option. An animated dead tree acts as an ally of the treant. The dead tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies; until the treant dies or is more than 120 feet from the tree; or until the treant takes a bonus action to turn it back into an inanimate dead tree.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The lizardfolk can hold its breath for 15 minutes.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lizardfolk makes two melee attacks, each one with a different weapon.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage and the target gains disadvantage on its next attack roll until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The druid is an 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

action.name: Sickle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Blight Touch (3/Day)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. The target takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the bodyguard can regain 9 hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bodyguard makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, one target. {@h}7 ({@dice 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Protection
entries: When an attacker the bodyguard can see makes an attack roll against a creature within 5 feet of the bodyguard, the bodyguard can impose disadvantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the bodyguard can regain 16 hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bodyguard makes two three melee attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, one target. {@h}8 ({@dice 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Intercept Attack
entries: In response to another creature within 5 feet of it being hit by an attack roll, the bodyguard gives that creature a +5 bonus to its AC against that attack, potentially causing a miss. To use this ability, the bodyguard must be able to see the creature and the attacker.

reaction.name: Self-Sacrifce
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the bodyguard is hit by an attack, the bodyguard swaps places with that c reature and is hit instead.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The devil's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). The devil can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Aura of Tyranny
entries: An ally that is within 30 feet of the devil and can see and hear the devil and has less hit points than the devil has advantage to saving throws against being {@condition charmed} and {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's {@sense darkvision}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Spur Allies
entries: As a bonus action, the devil targets up to two allies within 30 feet that can see and hear the devil and must have less hit points than the devil. The target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage and uses its reaction to make one melee attack with advantage on the roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its sting.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Sting
