A swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the slug, and it takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the slug's turns.

If the slug takes 20 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the slug must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the slug. If the slug dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 5 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Acid Glob Spit
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) acid damage and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Poison Spit
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 13 ({@damage 3d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition poisoned} in this way.

action.name: Shed Hairs (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Each creature within 10 feet of the tarantula must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature becomes {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. A creature spends its action on each of its turns retching and reeling while {@condition poisoned} in this way. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Creatures that don't need to breathe or are immune to poison automatically succeed on this saving throw.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The tiger beetle has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the tiger beetle moves at least 30 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a bite attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The velvet worm has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The velvet worm can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Web Spray {@recharge 5}
entries: The velvet worm spits webbing in a line that is 30 feet long and 10 feet wide. Each creature in that line must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by webbing. As an action, the {@condition restrained} creature can make a {@dc 13} Strength check, escaping from the webbing on a success. The effect ends if the webbing is destroyed. The webbing has AC 10, 5 hit points, resistance to bludgeoning damage, and immunity to poison and psychic damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The wolverine has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If the wolverine takes 20 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wolverine makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws. If both claw attacks hit a Large or smaller creature, the target takes an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) slashing damage and must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Aberrant Ground
entries: The ground in a 15-foot radius around the horror is doughlike difficult terrain. Each creature that starts its turn in that area must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or have its speed reduced to 0 until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Gibbering
entries: The horror babbles incoherently while it can see any creature and isn't {@condition incapacitated}. Each creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the horror and can hear the gibbering must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the creature can't take reactions until the start of its next turn and rolls a {@dice d8} to determine what it does its turn. On a 1 to 4, the creature does nothing. On a 5 or 6, the creature takes no action or bonus action and uses all its movement to move in a randomly determined direction. On a 7 or 8, the creature makes a melee attack against a randomly determined creature within its reach or does nothing if it can't make such an attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gibbering horror uses Engulf. It then makes two Pseudopod Bite attacks, and if it can, uses its Blinding Spittle.

action.name: Pseudopod Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d8 + 2}) piercing damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). Until the grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the horror can't use the same pseudopod bite on another target. If the horror starts its turn grappling with a creature, it can use a bonus action to pull that creature within 5 feet of it.

action.name: Blinding Spittle
entries: The horror spits a chemical glob at a point it can see within 20 feet of it. The glob explodes in a blinding flash of light on impact. Each creature within 5 feet of the flash must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the horror's next turn.

action.name: Engulf
entries: The horror moves up to its speed. While doing so, it can enter Medium or smaller creatures' spaces. Whenever the horror enters a creature's space, the creature must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw. On a successful save, the creature can choose to be pushed 5 feet back or to the side of the horror. A creature that chooses not to be pushed suffers the consequences of a failed saving throw. On a failed save, the horror enters the creature's space, and the creature takes 29 ({@damage 6d8 + 2}) piercing damage and is engulfed. While engulfed, the creature is {@condition blinded}, can't breathe, and {@condition restrained}, and takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage and 9 ({@damage 2d8}) acid damage at the start of each of the horror's turns. lf the target is killed by this damage, it is absorbed into the horror. When the horror moves, the engulfed creature moves with it. An engulfed creature can try to escape by taking an action to make a {@dc 13} Strength check. On a success, the creature escapes and enters a space of its choice within 5 feet of the horror. The horror can have only up to two Medium or small creatures engulfed at a time.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The glabrezu's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 18}). The glabrezu can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Aura of Discord
entries: A creature hostile to the glabrezu that starts its turn within 20 feet of the glabrezu must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw, unless the glabrezu is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the target is {@condition charmed} until the start of its next turn.

While {@condition charmed} by the glabrezu, the creature must move up to its speed and make a melee weapon attack against a creature of the glabrezu's choice that the glabrezu can see. Constructs and undead are immune to this effect.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The demon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The glabrezu makes four attacks: two with its pincers and two with its fists. Alternatively, it makes two attacks: two with its pincers and casts one spell.

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). The glabrezu has two pincers, each of which can grapple only one target.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Fiendish Charm
entries: One humanoid the glabrezu can see within 30 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or be magically {@condition charmed} for 1 day. The {@condition charmed} target obeys the glabrezu's spoken commands. If the target suffers any harm from the glabrezu or another creature or receives a suicidal command from the glabrezu, the target can repeat the saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the glabrezu's Fiendish Charm for the next 24 hours.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The glabrezu moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Slam
entries: The glabrezu makes a fist attack.

legendary.name: Pincer (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The glabrezu makes a pincer attack.

legendary.name: Charm (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The glabrezu uses its Fiendish Charm.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The glabrezu casts a spell from its list of innate spells, using a spell slot as normal.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

trait.name: Go for the Throat
entries: As a bonus action, the gnoll targets one hyena within 30 feet that can see and hear the gnoll. The hyena can use its reaction to move up to half its speed and make one melee attack against a {@condition prone} creature. If the hyena hits, the hit is automatically a critical hit.

trait.name: Slay Foe (1/Turn)
entries: The gnoll deals an extra 9 ({@dice 2d8}) damage with its weapon attack if it hits a creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

trait.name: Summon Hyenas (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the gnoll summons {@dice 1d4 + 1} hyenas. The hyenas appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the gnoll and acts as its allies. The hyenas act right after the gnoll on the same initiative count and fght until they're destroyed. They disappear when the gnoll dies.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gnoll makes two attacks, either with its glaive or its longbow. It can replace one of its attacks with hunting bolas.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Hunting Bolas
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d3 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} and knocked {@condition prone}. As an action, the {@condition restrained} creature can make a {@dc 13} Strength check, escaping on a success. The effect ends if the hunting bolas is destroyed. The hunting bolas has AC 10, 5 hit points, resistance to bludgeoning damage, and immunity to poison and psychic damage.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The gnoll has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the gnoll's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Packmaster
entries: A allied gnoll that starts its turn within 30 feet of this gnoll and that can see and hear this gnoll gains Pack Tactics until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the gnoll moves at least 15 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a greataxe attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the gnoll can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gnoll makes three attacks, either with its greataxe or its longbow. She can replace one of those attacks with Battlefeld

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Battlefeld Cunning {@recharge 4}
entries: Up to two allies within 60 feet of the gnoll that can hear it can use their reactions to make one melee attack each.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The gnoll is an 8th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

trait.name: Yeenoghu's Howl (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the gnoll emits a frenzy-inducing howl. Each gnoll ally that is within 30 feet of it, can hear it, and not already affected by Yeenoghu's Howl gain advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points until the start of the gnoll's next turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Change Shape (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The gnoll magically polymorphs into a giant hyena, remaining in that form for up to 1 hour. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the skeleton reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the skeleton can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The gnoll is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When the gnoll reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the gnoll can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Volatile
entries: When the goblin takes damage that is not poison or psychic damage, roll {@dice 1d20}. On a roll of 1 to 5, the goblin's alchemical pack explodes. The goblin and each creature within 10 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The goblin has disadvantage on its saving throw.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Acid Flask
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 5/20 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Goblin Molotov
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 20 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) fire damage and the target catches fire, taking 2 ({@damage 1d4}) fire damage at the end of each of its turns. An affected creature or another creature within 5 feet of it can take an action to extinguish the fire. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and doesn't catch fire.

action.name: Tangleweb
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 20 ft., one creature. {@h}The creature must succeed on a {@dc 11} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by sticky web-like adhesive. As an action, the {@condition restrained} creature can make a {@dc 11} Strength check, escaping from the tangleweb on a success. The effect ends if the tangleweb is destroyed. The tangleweb has AC 10, 5 hit points, resistance to bludgeoning damage, and immunity to poison and psychic damage.

action.name: Double Lob {@recharge 5}
entries: The goblin can make two ranged weapon attacks.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The goblin is an 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Hexblade's Curse (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the goblin targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target is cursed for 1 minute. The curse ends early if the target dies, the goblin dies, or it is {@condition incapacitated}. Until the curse ends, the goblin gains the following benefits:

items: It deals an extra 2 damage on damage rolls against the cursed target.
Any attack roll it makes against the cursed target is a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the {@dice d20}.
If the cursed target dies, the hex knight regains 5 hit points.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Self-Sacrifce
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the goblin is hit by an attack, the goblin swaps places with that creature and is hit instead.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Ganglord's Presence
entries: A goblin ally that starts its turn with 30 feet of this goblin and can see and hear this goblin deals an extra 3 ({@dice 1d6}) damage on its weapon damage rolls against a creature if at least two of the goblin's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The goblin deals an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the goblin that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the goblin doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The goblin makes two scimitar attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Redirect Attack
entries: When a creature the goblin can see targets it with an attack, the goblin chooses another goblin within 5 feet of it. The two goblins swap places, and the chosen goblin becomes the target instead.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The goblin deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the goblin that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the goblin doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The goblin makes two dagger attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The goblin is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

spells: {@spell conjure animals} (rats, spiders, and wolves only)

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Change Shape (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The goblin magically polymorphs into a worg, remaining in that form for up to 1 hour. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The skeleton can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Skirmish Advantage
entries: The goblin gains advantage on its first attack roll this turn if it has moved at least 15 feet from its space at the beginning of its turn.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Skirmisher
entries: When an enemy the goblin can see ends its turn within 5 feet of it, the goblin can move up to half its speed. This movement doesn't provoke {@action opportunity attack|phb|opportunity attacks}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The goblin is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 11}, {@hit 3} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The goblin can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Three-Headed
entries: The gorgimera has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the gorgimera moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the gorgon can make one attack with its hooves against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gorgimera makes four attacks: one with its lion head's bite, one with its dragon head's bite, one with its gore, and one with its claws. When its lightning breath is available, it can use the lightning breath in place of its dragon head's bite. When its petrifcation breath is available, it can use the petrifcation breath in place of its gore. However, it can't use both lightning and petrifcation breaths on the same turn.

action.name: Dragon Head's Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) percing damage plus 5 ({@dice 1d10}) lightning.

action.name: Lion Head's Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) percing damage.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge}
entries: The dragon head exhales lightning in an 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 44 ({@damage 8d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Petrifcation Breath {@recharge}
entries: The gorgon head exhales petrifying gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target is petrifed until freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the goristro moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 44 ({@damage 8d10}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 22} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}. If the target's saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

trait.name: Labyrinthine Recall
entries: The goristro can perfectly recall any path it has traveled.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The demon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The goristro deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The goristro makes four attacks: one with its bite, two with its fists, and one with its hoof. The goristro can use its Trample in place of its hoof attack if it is available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 3d10 + 8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Hoof
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}24 ({@damage 3d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 22} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}52 ({@damage 8d10 + 8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Trample {@recharge 5}
entries: The goristro moves up to its speed in a straight line. During this move, it can enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces. A creature whose space the goristro enters must succeed on a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is pushed 5 feet to the nearest space out of the goristro's path. On a failed save, the creature falls {@condition prone} and takes 24 ({@damage 3d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage. If the goristro remains in the {@condition prone} creature's space, the creature is also {@condition restrained} until it's no longer in the same space as the goristro. While {@condition restrained} in this way, the creature, or another creature within 5 feet of it, can make a {@dc 22} Strength check. On a success, the creature is shunted to an unoccupied space of its choice within 5 feet of the goristro and is no longer {@condition restrained}.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The bulette's long jump is up to 40 feet and its high jump is up to 20 feet, with or without a running start.

trait.name: Burst Forth (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The bulette breaks through solid ground or wall as a bonus action, showering the area with debris. Each creature within 15 feet of the bulette that is surprised must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength check, taking 20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save, or half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone} on a successful one.

trait.name: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If the bulette takes 29 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bulette makes three melee attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}38 ({@damage 5d12 + 6}) percing damage, and if the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until this grapple ends, the bulette can bite only the {@condition grappled} creature and has advantage on attack rolls to do so.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Deadly Leap
entries: If the bulette jumps at least 15 feet as part of its movement, it can then use this action to land on its feet in a space that contains one or more other creatures. Each of those creatures must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength or Dexterity saving throw (target's choice) or be knocked {@condition prone} and take 19 ({@dice 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) slashing damage. On a successful save, the creature takes only half the damage, isn't knocked {@condition prone}, and is pushed 5 feet out of the bulette's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice. If no unoccupied space is with in range, the creature instead falls {@condition prone} in the bulette's space.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The bulette makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is also swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the target is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the bulette, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the bulette's turns. A bulette can have only up to one Medium or two Small creatures swallowed at a time.

If the bulette takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the bulette must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the bulette. If the bulette dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 10 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Keen Sight and Smell
entries: The owlbear has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight or smell.

trait.name: Stunning Screech {@recharge 5}
entries: As a bonus action, the owlbear emits a shrill, earsplitting screech. Each creature within 20 feet of the owlbear and able to hear the screech succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The owlbear uses Stunning Screech. It then makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Petrifying Gaze
entries: If a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the cockatrice and the two of them can see each other, the cockatrice can force the creature to make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw if the cockatrice isn't {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature magically begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is petrifed until freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

A creature that isn't surprised can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If it does so, it can't see the cockatrice until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If it looks at the cockatrice in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cockatrice makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its claws, and one with its stinger.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw against being magically petrifed. On a failed save, the creature begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is petrifed for 24 hours.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 31 ({@damage 9d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

immune.note: from nonmagical weapons

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The greater couatl's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring only verbal components:

trait.name: Ethereal Jaunt
entries: As a bonus action, the greater couatl can magically shift from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane, or vice versa.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The greater couatl doesn't provoke an {@action opportunity attack} when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The greater couatl's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Shielded Mind
entries: The greater couatl is immune to scrying and to any effect that would sense its emotions, read its thoughts, or detect its location.

trait.name: Twist Free
entries: The greater couatl automatically makes its saving throws against paralysis and being {@condition restrained} at the end of its turn as long as it is not {@condition unconscious}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The greater couatl makes two attacks: one with its bite and one to constrict.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 24 hours.
Until this poison ends, the target is {@condition unconscious}. Another creature can use an action to shake the target awake.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one Large or smaller creature. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the greater couatl can't constrict another target.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The greater couatl magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast that has a challenge rating equal to or less than its own, or back into its true form. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (the greater couatl's choice).

In a new form, the greater couatl retains its game statistics and ability to speak, but its AC, movement modes, Strength, Dexterity, and other actions are replaced by those of the new form, and it gains any statistics and capabilities (except class features, legendary actions, and lair actions) that the new form has but that it lacks. If the new form has a bite attack, the greater couatl can use its bite in that form.

legendary.name: Bite
entries: The greater couatl makes a bite attack.

legendary.name: Teleport
entries: The greater couatl teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The greater couatl casts a spell from its list of innate spells, using a spell slot as normal.

legendary.name: Radiant Burst (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The greater couatl emits a burst of radiant energy. All allies within 20 feet of the greater couatl regain 18 ({@dice 3d8}) hit points. All other creatures within 20 feet must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 3d8}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gorgon makes two melee attacks: one with its gore and one with its hooves. It can replace its hooves attack with Trample if it is available.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) percing damage.

action.name: Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Trample {@recharge 5}
entries: The gorgon moves up to its speed in a straight line. During this move, it can enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces. A creature whose space the gorgon enters must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is pushed 5 feet to the nearest space out of the gorgon's path. On a failed save, the creature falls {@condition prone} and takes 23 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage. If the gorgon remains in the {@condition prone} creature's space, the creature is also {@condition restrained} until it's no longer in the same space as the gorgon. While {@condition restrained} in this way, the creature, or another creature within 5 feet of it, can make a {@dc 23} Strength check. On a success, the creature is shunted to an unoccupied space of its choice within 5 feet of the gorgon and is no longer {@condition restrained}

action.name: Petrifying Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The gorgon exhales petrifying gas in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. The {@condition restrained} target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends on the target. On a failure, the target is petrifed until freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other magic.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The mimic can use its action to polymorph into an object or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn 't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)
entries: The mimic adheres to anything that touches it. A creature adhered to the mimic is also {@condition grappled} by it (escape {@dc 15}). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have disadvantage.

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: The mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised.

trait.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
entries: While the mimic remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

trait.name: Grappler
entries: The mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature {@condition grappled} by it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mimic makes three attacks: two with its pseudopods and one with its bite or acid spit.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the mimic is in object form, the target is subjected to its Adhesive trait.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) acid damage.

action.name: Acid Spit
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) acid damage.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The shadow can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow can take the {@action Hide} action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Shadow Step
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow can teleport as a bonus action up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see that is also in dim light or darkness. It then has advantage on the first melee attack it makes before the end of the turn.

trait.name: Sunlight Weakness
entries: While in sunlight, the shadow has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

action.name: Strength Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3}) necrotic damage, and the target's Strength score is reduced by {@dice 1d6}. The target dies if this reduces its Strength

action.name: to 0
entries: Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.
If a non-evil humanoid dies from this attack, a new shadow rises from the corpse {@dice 1d4} hours later.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The demon can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1 {@dice d1}
0) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Light Sensitivity
entries: While in bright light, the demon has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Shadow Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the demon can take the {@action Hide} action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Shadow Step
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the demon can teleport as a bonus action up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see that is also in dim light or darkness. It then has advantage on the first melee attack it makes before the end of the turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The demon makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) psychic damage or, if the demon had advantage on the attack roll, 25 ({@damage 6d6 + 4}) psychic damage.

action.name: Insidious Darkness (1/Day)
entries: Magical darkness surges forth from the demon, filling a 30-foot radius sphere centering around it and spreading around corners. A creature with {@sense darkvision} can't see through this darkness. Non-magical light, as well as light created by spells of 4th level or lower, can't illuminate the area. Demonic cackling, screams, and laughter can be heard within the sphere.

Whenever a creature that isn't a demon starts its turn in the sphere, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The demon must concentrate to maintain the insidious darkness (as if concentrating on a spell), which lasts for up to 1 minute.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hag's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 12}). She can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hag is an 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The hag can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The hag can mimic animal sounds and humanoid voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 14} Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or have its Strength score reduced by {@dice 1d4}. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to
Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.

action.name: Illusory Appearance
entries: The hag covers herself and anything she is wearing or carrying with a magical illusion that makes her look like another creature of her general size and humanoid shape. The illusion ends if the hag takes a bonus action to end it or if she dies.

The changes wrought by this effect fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, the hag could appear to have smooth skin, but someone touching her would feel her rough flesh. Otherwise, a creature must take an action to visually inspect the illusion and succeed on a {@dc 20} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check to discern that the hag is disguised.

action.name: Change Shape (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The hag magically polymorphs into any beast of CR 4 or less, remaining in that form for up to 1 hour. It can revert to its true form as a bonus action. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Maddening Cackle {@recharge 5}
entries: Each creature within 30 feet of the hag and able to hear the hag must succeed on a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 14 ({@dice 3d8 + 1}) psychic damage, and must use its reaction to move up to half its speed and make a melee weapon attack against one creature of the hag's choice that the hag can see. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and suffers no other effects. Constructs and undead are immune to this effect.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the greenvise remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary giant plant.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The greenvise makes three attacks: one with its bite attack and two with its tendrils.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the greenvise. A swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the greenvise, and it takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the greenvise's turns.

If the greenvise takes 20 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the greenvise must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the greenvise. If the greenvise dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 5 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage.

If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}), {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends, and is pulled up to 15 feet toward the greenvise. The greenvise has two tendrils, each of which can grapple one target.

action.name: Death Fog (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The greenvise emits a greenish, acidic mist that fills 30-foot radius sphere centered on the greenvise that lasts for 1 minute. The fog spreads around corners, and its area is heavily obscured. A creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the greenvise must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage, can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the creature can use either an action or a bonus action on its turn, but not both. These effects last until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and suffers no other effects. The greenvise is immune to the effects of its death fog.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The grell's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 15}). It can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The grell makes five attacks: four with its tentacles and one with its beak, or uses its lightning ray twice.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The {@condition poisoned} target is {@condition paralyzed}, and it can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

The target is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). If the target is Large or smaller, it is also {@condition restrained} until this grapple ends. While grappling the target, the grell has advantage on attack rolls against it and can't use this attack against other targets. When the grell moves, any
Huge or smaller target it is grappling moves with it.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) percing damage.

action.name: Lightning Ray
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 6d6 + 3}) lightning damage.
