action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The {@condition poisoned} target is {@condition paralyzed}, and it can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

The target is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). If the target is Large or smaller, it is also {@condition restrained} until this grapple ends. While grappling the target, the grell has advantage on attack rolls against it and can't use this attack against other targets. When the grell moves, any
Large or smaller target it is grappling moves with it.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) percing damage.

action.name: Lightning Ray
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 3d6 + 2}) lightning damage.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The grick has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The grick makes three attacks: one with its tail and two with its tentacles. If it hits a creature with any of its tentacles, the grick can make one beak attack against the same target.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature and the attack roll against the target succeeds by 5 or more, the target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) percing damage.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The grick has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The grick makes one attack with its tentacles. If that attack hits, the grick can make one beak attack against the same target.

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) percing damage.

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the griffon is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to the target.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The griffon makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) percing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Smite (3/day)
entries: If the griffon hits a good-aligned creature with a melee weapon attack, it can choose to deal an extra 9 ({@dice 2d8} ) necrotic damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The griffon uses Frightful Presence. It then makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) percing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the griffon's choice that is within 30 feet of the griffon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the griffon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

monster.name: Grimlock Brute
senses: blindsight 30 ft. or 10 ft. while deafened (blind beyond this radius)

trait.name: Blind Senses
entries: The grimlock can't use its {@sense blindsight} while {@condition deafened} and unable to smell.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the grimlock hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The grimlock has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The grimlock has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Bone Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) slashing damage.

monster.name: Grimlock Cavestalker
senses: blindsight 30 ft. or 10 ft. while deafened (blind beyond this radius)

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The grimlock is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 11}). It has the following ranger spells prepared:

trait.name: Blind Senses
entries: The grimlock can't use its {@sense blindsight} while {@condition deafened} and unable to smell.

trait.name: Cave Strider
entries: Moving through nonmagical difficult cavern or underground terrain doesn't cost the grimlock extra movement.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The grimlock has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Stealthy
entries: On each of its turns, the grimlock can use a bonus action to take the {@action Hide} action.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The grimlock has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

trait.name: Slay Foe (1/Turn)
entries: The grimlock deals an extra 9 ({@dice 2d8}) damage with its weapon attack if it hits a creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

action.name: Bone Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

monster.name: Grimlock Chieftain
senses: blindsight 30 ft. or 10 ft. while deafened (blind beyond this radius)

trait.name: Blind Senses
entries: The grimlock can't use its {@sense blindsight} while {@condition deafened} and unable to smell.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the grimlock hits with it (included in the attack).

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The grimlock has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The grimlock has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

trait.name: Blood Cry (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, ally that is within 30 feet of this grimlock, can hear the grimlock, and not already affected by Blood Cry deals an extra 4 ({@dice 1d8}) damage on its weapon damage rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points until the start of the grimlock's next turn.

action.name: Skull Thump (1/turn)
entries: Once per turn, when the grimlock hits a creature with a melee weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, it can attempt to stun it. The target must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The grimlock makes two great spiked bone club attacks.

action.name: Great Spiked Bone Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) piercing damage.

monster.name: Grimlock Shaman
senses: blindsight 30 ft. or 10 ft. while deafened (blind beyond this radius)

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The grimlock is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following druid spells prepared:

trait.name: Blind Senses
entries: The grimlock can't use its {@sense blindsight} while {@condition deafened} and unable to smell.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The grimlock has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The grimlock has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Spiked Bone Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The hydra can hold its breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: The hydra has five heads. While it has more than one head, the hydra has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.
Whenever the hydra takes 40 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, the hydra dies.

At the end of its turn, it grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken fire damage since its last turn. The hydra regains 15 hit points for each head regrown in this way.

trait.name: Reactive Heads
entries: For each head the hydra has beyond one, it gets an extra reaction that can be used only for {@action opportunity attack|phb|opportunity attacks}.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the gulguthydra must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the gulguthydra's Stench for 24 hours.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While the hydra sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hydra makes as many bite attacks as it has heads, and two tentacle attacks. It can replace both tentacle attacks with tentacle slam.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) percing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw against disease or become {@condition poisoned} until the disease is cured. Every 24 hours that elapse, the target must repeat the saving throw, reducing its hit point maximum by 5 ({@dice 1d10}) on a failure . The disease is cured on a success. The target dies if the disease reduces its hit point maximum to 0. This reduction to the target's hit point maximum lasts until the disease is cured.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) piercing damage.

If the target is Large or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}) and {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends. The gulguthydra has two tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

action.name: Tentacle Slam
entries: The gulguthydra slams creatures {@condition grappled} by it into each other or a solid surface. Each creature must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or take 20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of the gulguthydra's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the half-dragon moves at least 10 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing Damage.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-dragon exhales acid in a 15- foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 5d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the half-green dragon megaraptor moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the half-green dragon megaraptor can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The half-green dragon megaraptor makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing Damage. .

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Poison Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-red dragon tyrannosaurus rex exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the half-dragon moves at least 30 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the half-dragon can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) piercing damage. .

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-dragon exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The half-red dragon tyrannosaurus rex makes two attacks: one with its bite one with its tail. It can't make both attacks against the same target.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}33 ({@damage 4d12 + 7}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}) . Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the half-red dragon tyrannosaurus rex can't bite another target or use its fire breath.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The half-red dragon tyrannosaurus rex exhales fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 56 ({@damage 16d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The harpy's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). The harpy can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The harpy is an 11th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:

trait.name: Agonizing Blast
entries: When the harpy casts eldritch blast, she adds her Charisma modifer to the damage it deals on a hit.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The harpy makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its mace.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 1}) slashing damage.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Luring Song
entries: The harpy sings a magical melody. Every humanoid and giant within 300 feet of the harpy that can hear the song must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the song ends. The harpy must take a bonus action on its subsequent turns to continue singing. It can stop singing at any time. The song ends if the harpy is {@condition incapacitated}.

While {@condition charmed} by the harpy, a target is {@condition incapacitated} and ignores the songs of other harpies. If the {@condition charmed} target is more than 5 feet away from the harpy, the target can take the {@action Dash} action on its turn to move toward the harpy by the most direct route. It doesn't avoid {@action opportunity attack|phb|opportunity attacks}, but before moving into damaging terrain, such as lava or a pit , and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the harpy, a target can repeat the saving throw. A creature can also repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns . If a creature's saving throw is successful , the effect ends on it. A target that successfully saves is immune to this harpy's song for the next 24 hours.

reaction.name: Vexing Screech {@recharge 4}
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of the harpy, is visible to the harpy, and can hear the harpy makes an attack roll but before the outcome is determined, the harpy can impose disadvantage to the creature's attack roll. If the attack misses, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Charisma saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage and is knocked {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The harpy's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). The harpy can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The harpy is an 17th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:

trait.name: Agonizing Blast
entries: When the harpy casts eldritch blast, she adds her Charisma modifer to the damage it deals on a hit.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The harpy makes two attacks: one with its claws and one with its mace.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Luring Song
entries: The harpy sings a magical melody. Every humanoid and giant within 300 feet of the harpy that can hear the song must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the song ends. The harpy must take a bonus action on its subsequent turns to continue singing. It can stop singing at any time. The song ends if the harpy is {@condition incapacitated}.

While {@condition charmed} by the harpy, a target is {@condition incapacitated} and ignores the songs of other harpies. If the {@condition charmed} target is more than 5 feet away from the harpy, the target can take the {@action Dash} action on its turn to move toward the harpy by the most direct route. It doesn't avoid {@action opportunity attack|phb|opportunity attacks}, but before moving into damaging terrain, such as lava or a pit , and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the harpy, a target can repeat the saving throw. A creature can also repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns . If a creature's saving throw is successful , the effect ends on it. A target that successfully saves is immune to this harpy's song for the next 24 hours.

reaction.name: Vexing Screech {@recharge 4}
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of the harpy, is visible to the harpy, and can hear the harpy makes an attack roll but before the outcome is determined, the harpy can impose disadvantage to the creature's attack roll. If the attack misses, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw or take 26 ({@damage 6d8}) psychic damage and is knocked {@condition prone}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hex knight is a 17th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the hex knight fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Eldritch War Magic
entries: When the hex knight uses its action to cast a spell or cantrip, it can make one weapon attack as a bonus action.

trait.name: Hexblade's Curse (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the hex knight targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target is cursed for 1 minute. The curse ends early if the target dies, the hex knight dies, or it is {@condition incapacitated}. Until the curse ends, the hex knight gains the following benefits:

items: It deals an extra 5 damage on damage rolls against the cursed target.
Any attack roll it makes against the cursed target is a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the {@dice d20}.
If the cursed target dies, the hex knight regains 20 hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hex knight makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage and the target gains disadvantage to its attack rolls and saving throws until the end of the Hex Knight's next turn.

reaction.name: Armor of Hexes
entries: When hit by an attack roll by a creature cursed by the hex knight's Hexblade's Curse, roll a {@dice d6}. On a roll of 4 or higher, the attack instead misses the hex knight, regardless of its roll.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The hex knight makes a weapon attack.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: The hex knight casts a cantrip.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The hex knight moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The hex knight casts a spell from its list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hexblade is an 11th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:

trait.name: Hexblade's Curse (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the hexblade targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target is cursed for 1 minute. The curse ends early if the target dies, the hexblade dies, or it is {@condition incapacitated}. Until the curse ends, the hexblade gains the following benefits:

items: It deals an extra 3 damage on damage rolls against the cursed target.
Any attack roll it makes against the cursed target is a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the {@dice d20}.
If the cursed target dies, the hex knight regains 14 hit points.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Armor of Hexes
entries: When hit by an attack roll by a creature cursed by the hexblade's Hexblade's Curse, roll a {@dice d6}. On a roll of 4 or higher, the attack instead misses the hexblade, regardless of its roll.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hezrou's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}). The hezrou can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The demon has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Sickening Stench
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the hezrou must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. Until this poison ends, the target is {@condition stunned}. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the hezrou's sickening stench for 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hezrou makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Ruthless Command (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, the hezrou can issue a telepathic command whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll. The creature takes {@damage 1d8} psychic damage and can add a {@dice d8} to its roll provided it can understand the hezrou. A creature can beneft from only one ruthless command die at a time. This effect ends if the hezrou is {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The hezrou magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Claw
entries: The hezrou makes a claw attack.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The hezrou magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The hezrou casts a spell from its list of innate spells, using a spell slot as normal.

trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the sphinx is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a melee weapon attack, the attack deals an extra 9 ({@dice 2d8}) damage to the target.

trait.name: Inscrutable
entries: The sphinx is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, as well as any divination spell that it refuses. Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) checks made to ascertain the sphinx's intentions or sincerity have disadvantage.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The sphinx has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The sphinx's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The sphinx makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws. If both claw attacks hit the same creature, the target takes an extra 9 ({@damage 2d8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) percing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Stunning Screech {@recharge 5}
entries: As a bonus action, the sphinx emits a shrill, earsplitting screech. Each creature within 60 feet of the sphinx and able to hear the screech succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The high inquisitor is a 19th-level spell caster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 16}). It has the following paladin spells prepared:

trait.name: Aura of Judgement
entries: A creature hostile to the high inquisitor that is within 15 feet of the high inquisitor has disadvantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the high inquisitor fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Smite (1/Turn)
entries: As a bonus action, when the high inquisitor hits a creature with a weapon attack, it can expend a 1st level spell slot to deal {@damage 2d8} necrotic or radiant damage to the target, and the target must succeed in a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} the end of its next turn. If the high inquisitor expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each level above 1st (maximum {@dice 5d8}).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The high inquisitor makes three melee attacks. It can use Glare of Reckoning in place of one melee attack.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 13 force damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) piercing damage.

action.name: Glare of Reckoning
entries: The high inquisitor targets one {@condition frightened} creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, the target is {@condition paralyzed} until the high inquisitor deals damage to it, or until the end of the high inquisitor's next turn.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The high inquisitor makes a weapon attack.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The high inquisitor moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Glare
entries: The high inquisitor uses its Glare of Reckoning.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The high inquisitor casts a spell from its list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the giant can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two greatclub attacks. It can use its Cleaving Swing in place of one of its greatclub attacks

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Cleaving Swing {@recharge 5}
entries: The giant swings its greatclub, and every creature within 10 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed saving throw, a creature takes 19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

trait.name: Overbearing
entries: As a bonus action, the giant can make a kick attack against a creature that is Medium or smaller.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Kick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Battle Cry (1/Day)
entries: Each creature of the giant's choice that is within 30 feet of it, can hear it, and not already affected by Battle Cry gain advantage on attack rolls until the start of the giant's next turn. The giant can then make one attack as a bonus action.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The giant moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Greatclub (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The giant makes a greatclub attack.

legendary.name: Bark Command (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: The giant targets up to two allies it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the giant, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction but has disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mummy can use its Dreadful Glare and makes two rotting fist attacks.

action.name: Rotting Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be cursed with mummy rot. The cursed target can't regain hit points, and its hit point maximum decreases by 10 ({@dice 3d6}) for every 24 hours that elapse. If the curse reduces the target's hit point maximum to 0, the target dies, and its body turns to dust. The curse lasts until removed by the {@spell remove curse} spell or other magic.

action.name: Dreadful Glare
entries: The mummy targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. If the target can see the mummy, it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become {@condition frightened} until the end of the mummy's next turn. If the target fails the saving throw by 5 or more, it is also {@condition paralyzed} for the same duration. A target that succeeds on the saving throw is immune to the Dreadful Glare of all mummies (but not mummy lords) for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two greatclub attacks.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two greatclub attacks.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Grolantor's Glare
entries: When a creature attacks the giant, and the attacker is within 30 feet and visible to the giant, the attacker must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the attacker is {@condition frightened} until the end of the giant's next turn.

entries: The griffon has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hobgoblin is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). It has the following paladin spells prepared:

trait.name: Aura of Dread
entries: A creature hostile to the hobgoblin that starts its turn within 20 feet of the hobgoblin must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw, unless the hobgoblin is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the target is {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn. While {@condition frightened} in this way, the target can't perform any actions except move up to half its speed. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the hobgoblin's Aura of Dread for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Martial Advantage (1/Turn)
entries: The hobgoblin can deal an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Smite (1/Turn)
entries: As a bonus action, when the hobgoblin hits a creature with a weapon attack, it can expend a 1st level spell slot to deal an extra {@damage 2d8} necrotic damage and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn. The creature is {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition frightened}.
If the hobgoblin expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra necrotic damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each level above 1st (maximum 5d8).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin makes two morningstar attacks or two longbow attacks. It can use Command Ally in place of one weapon attack.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Command Ally
entries: The hobgoblin targets an ally within 30 feet that can see and hear the hobgoblin. The target uses its reaction to move up to half its speed and make one melee attack.

action.name: Dreadmaster's Presence (1/Day)
entries: Each ally within 30 feet of the hobgoblin, can see the hobgoblin, and not already affected by Dreadmaster's Presence gain advantage on attack rolls until the start of the hobgoblin's next turn. Each creature of the hobgoblin's choice that is within 30 feet of it, can see it, and not already affected by Dreadmaster's Presence become {@condition frightened} until the start of the hobgoblin's next turn.

trait.name: Lightfooted
entries: The hobgoblin can take the {@action Dash} or {@action Disengage} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Martial Advantage (1/Turn)
entries: The hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin makes two shortsword attacks or two longbow attacks.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

entries: The skeleton can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the skeleton and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) slashing damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hobgoblin is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following sorcerer spells prepared:

trait.name: Arcane Advantage (1/Turn)
entries: The hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a damaging spell attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Martial Advantage (1/Turn)
entries: The hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Sorcery Points
entries: The hobgoblin has 6 sorcery points. It can spend 1 or more sorcery points as a bonus action to gain one of the following benefits:

Empowered Spell: When the hobgoblin rolls damage for a spell, it can spend 1 sorcery point to reroll up to 3 damage dice. It must use the new rolls. It can use Empowered Spell even if it has already used a different Metamagic option during the casting of the spell.
Quickened Spell: When the hobgoblin casts a spell that has a casting time of 1 action, the giant can spend 2 sorcery points to change the casting time to 1 bonus action for this casting.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin makes two spear attacks.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Acid Breath (1/Day)
entries: The hobgoblin exhales acid in an 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Fire Breath (1/Day)
entries: The hobgoblin exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Martial Advantage (1/Turn)
entries: The hobgoblin can deal an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin makes two longsword attacks or two longbow attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Direct Counterstrike
entries: In response to a creature missing the hobgoblin with a melee attack and the attacker is visible to the hobgoblin, it can target an ally within 5 feet of the creature. If the ally can see and hear the hobgoblin, it uses its reaction to make one melee weapon attack against the creature with advantage on the attack roll.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The hobgoblin is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Martial Advantage (1/Turn)
entries: The hobgoblin can deal an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of the hobgoblin and that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hobgoblin makes two morningstar attacks.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Guided Strike (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The hobgoblin grants a + 10 bonus to an attack roll made by itself or another creature within 30 feet of it. The hobgoblin can make this choice after the roll is made but before it hits or misses.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The hook horror can't use its {@sense blindsight} while {@condition deafened}.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The hook horror has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The hook horror has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hook horror's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Packmaster
entries: An allied hook horror that starts its turn within 30 feet of this hook horror and that can see and hear this hook horror gains
Pack Tactics until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hook horror makes two hook attacks. If both hook attacks hit the same creature, the hook horror can make one beak attack against the same target.

action.name: Hook
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) percing damage.

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The hook horror can't use its {@sense blindsight} while {@condition deafened}.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The hook horror has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The hook horror has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hook horror's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Packmaster
entries: An allied hook horror that starts its turn within 30 feet of this hook horror and that can see and hear this hook horror gains
Pack Tactics until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hook horror makes three attacks: one with its beak and two with its hooks.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) percing damage.

action.name: Hook
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) slashing damage and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and the hook horror can automatically hit the target with its hook attack but can't use one of its hook attacks against other targets.

resist.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The devil's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}). It can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's {@sense darkvision}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes three attacks: two with its spiked chain and one with its tail. It can use its Hurl Flame or Spiked Chain Slam in place of one spiked chain attack.

action.name: Spiked Chain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) slashing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). While a creature is {@condition grappled} this way, the horned devil can't use one of its spiked chain attacks.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) slashing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). If the target is a creature other than an undead or a construct,it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or lose 10 ({@dice 3d6}) hit points at the start of each of its turns due to an infernal wound. Each time the devil hits the wounded target with this attack, the damage dealt by the wound increases by 10 ({@dice 3d6}). Any creature can take an action to stanch the wound with a successful {@dc 12} Wisdom ({@skill Medicine}) check. The wound also closes if the target receives magical healing.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it also catches fire.

action.name: Spiked Chain Slam
entries: The devil slams a Large or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by its spiked chain into another creature or a solid surface within 20 feet. Both creatures must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half the bludgeoning damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.

action.name: Sweeping Spiked Chains {@recharge 5}
entries: The devil expertly whirls its spiked chains rapidly around in a wide sweeping arc, and every creature within 20 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw. On a failed saving throw, a creature takes 28 ({@dice 4d10 + 6}) slashing damage and, if it is Large or smaller, is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and is not knocked {@condition prone}. The devil can't use this feature if it has a creature {@condition grappled} by its spiked chains.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The devil magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The devil moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The devil makes one spiked chain, tail, or hurl flame attack.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The devil magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The devil casts a spell from its list of innate spells, using a spell slot as normal.

trait.name: Confusing Gaze
entries: When a creature starts its turn within 30 feet of the umber hulk and is able to see the umber hulk's eyes, the umber hulk can magically force it to make a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw, unless the umber hulk is {@condition incapacitated}.

On a failed saving throw, the creature can't take reactions until the start of its next turn and rolls a {@dice d10} to determine what it does during that turn. On a 1 to 4, the creature does nothing. On a 5 to 7, the creature takes no action but uses all its movement to move in a random direction. On a 8 to 10, the creature makes one melee attack against a random creature, or it does nothing if no creature is within reach.

Unless surprised, a creature can avert its eyes to avoid the saving throw at the start of its turn. If the creature does so, it can't see the umber hulk until the start of its next turn, when it can avert its eyes again. If the creature looks at the umber hulk in the meantime, it must immediately make the save.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The umber hulk can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 5 foot-wide, 8-foot-high tunnel in its wake.

trait.name: Burst Forth (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The umber hulk breaks through solid ground or wall as a bonus action, showering the area with debris. Each creature within 15 feet of the umber hulk that is surprised must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength check, taking 24 ({@damage 5d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone} on a failed save, or half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone} on a successful one.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The umber hulk makes three attacks: two with its claws and one with its mandibles. If both claw attacks hit the same creature, the target takes an extra 9 ({@dice 2d8} ) slashing damage and must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Mandibles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) slashing damage and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 19}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, the umber hulk can automatically hit the target with its mandibles, and the umber hulk can't use its mandibles against other targets.

resist.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The devil' innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 19}). It can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Aura of Chilling Frost
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the devil takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage and can't use reactions until the end of the devil's next turn.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the devil's {@sense darkvision}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The devil makes three attacks: one with its bite, one with its ice spear, and one with its tail. It can use its Frost Ray in place of a melee attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Ice Spear
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, or for 1 minute, its speed is reduced by 10 feet; it can take either an action or a bonus action on each of its turns, not both; and it can't take reactions. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Frost Ray
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 11} to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. {@h}17 ({@damage 5d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage.

action.name: Ruthless Command (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, the devil can issue a telepathic command whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll. The creature takes {@damage 1d8} psychic damage and can add a {@dice d10} to its roll provided it can understand the devil. A creature can beneft from only one ruthless command die at a time. This effect ends if the devil is {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Wall of Ice {@recharge}
entries: The devil magically forms an opaque wall of ice on a solid surface it can see within 60 feet of it. The wall is 1 foot thick and up to 30 feet long and 10 feet high, or it's a hemispherical dome up to 20 feet in diameter.

When the wall appears, each creature in its space is pushed out of it by the shortest route. The creature chooses which side of the wall to end up on, unless the creature is {@condition incapacitated}. The creature then makes a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

The wall lasts for 1 minute or until the devil is {@condition incapacitated} or dies. The wall can be damaged and breached; each 10-foot section has AC 5, 30 hit points, vulnerability to fire damage, and immunity to acid, cold, necrotic, poison, and psychic damage. If a section is destroyed, it leaves behind a sheet of frigid air in the s pace the wall occupied. Whenever a creature finishes moving through the frigid air on a turn, willingly or otherwise, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The frigid air dissipates when the rest of the wall vanishes.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The devil magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The devil makes a bite, ice spear, tail, or frost ray attack.

legendary.name: Command
entries: The devil targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear the devil, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction.

legendary.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The devil magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

legendary.name: Blizzard (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Blinding snow and freezing jagged ice cascade and swirl magically around the devil. Each creature within 20 feet of the devil must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) cold damage and is {@condition blinded} and can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the creature can use either an action or a bonus action on its turn, but not both. These effects last until the end of the devil's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and suffers no other effects.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The troll has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The troll makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its maul.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d12 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage.

trait.name: Fire Aura
entries: At the start of each of the immolith's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite.

trait.name: Fire Form
entries: The immolith can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the immolith or hits it with a melee attack while with in 5 feet of it takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage. In addition, the immolith can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage and catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The immolith sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light in an additional 20 feet.

trait.name: Water Susceptibility
entries: For every 5 feet the immolith moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The immolith uses deathfire curse and makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). While a creature is {@condition grappled}, it loses resistance to fire. The immolith can have up to four creatures {@condition grappled}.

action.name: Deathfire Curse
entries: The immolith targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage and catches fire, taking 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the end of each of its turns. An affected creature or another creature within 5 feet of it can take an action to extinguish the fire. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and doesn't catch fire.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The inquisitor is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}). It has the following paladin spells prepared:

trait.name: Aura of Judgement
entries: A creature hostile to the inquisitor that is within 10 feet of the inquisitor has disadvantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Smite (1/Turn)
entries: As a bonus action, when the inquisitor hits a creature with a weapon attack, it can expend a 1st level spell slot to deal {@damage 2d8} necrotic or radiant damage to the target, and the target must succeed in a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} the end of its next turn. If the inquisitor expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each level above 1st (maximum {@dice 5d8}).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The inquisitor makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 1} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) piercing damage.

monster.name: Iron Golem Juggernaut

immune.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't adamantine

languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Fire Absorption
entries: Whenever the golem is subjected to acid damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the acid damage dealt.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The golem deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The golem makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d8 + 9}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}31 ({@damage 4d10 + 9}) slashing damage.

action.name: Crushing Stride
entries: The golem moves up to its speed in a straight line. During this move, it can enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces. A creature whose space the golem enters must succeed on a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw. On a successful save, the creature is pushed 5 feet to the nearest space out of the golem's path. On a failed save, the creature falls {@condition prone} and takes 27 ({@damage 4d8 + 9}) bludgeoning damage. If the golem remains in the {@condition prone} creature's space, the creature is also {@condition restrained} until it's no longer in the same space as the golem.

While {@condition restrained} in this way, the creature, or another creature within 5 feet of it, can make a {@dc 23} Strength check. On a success, the creature is shunted to an unoccupied space of its choice within 5 feet of the golem and is no longer {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Poison Breath {@recharge}
entries: The golem exhales poison gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw, taking 54 ({@damage 12d8}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Keen Sight and Smell
entries: The owlbear has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight or smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The owlbear makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws. It can use its Wing Cleave in place of its claws.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Wing Cleave {@recharge 4}
entries: The owlbear unfurls and swipes its swings around, and every creature within 10 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed saving throw, a creature takes 17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) slashing damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

action.name: Ironfeather Spray {@recharge 5}
entries: The owlbear flings razor-sharp feathers in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

immune.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The jackalwere is a 6th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following bard spells prepared:

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The jackalwere can use its action to polymorph into a specifc Medium human or a jackal-humanoid hybrid, or back into its true form (that of a Small jackal). Other than its size, its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The jackalwere has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The jackalwere has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the warhound's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Dark Whispers
entries: The jackalwere can use a bonus action on its turn to target one creature within 30 feet of it. If the target can hear the jackalwere, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. While {@condition frightened} in this way, a creature must take the {@action Dash} action and move away from the jackalwere by the safest available route on each of its turns, unless there is nowhere to move, in which case it needn't take the Dash

action.name: line of sight to the jackalwere, the creature can repeat the saving
entries: throw. On a success, the effect ends.

action.name: Psychic Blades (3/day)
entries: The jackalwere deals an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack.

action.name: Bite ( Jackal or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Scimitar (Human or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Sleep Gaze
entries: The jackalwere gazes at one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 10} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target succumbs to a magical slumber, falling {@condition unconscious} for 10 minutes or until someone uses an action to shake the target awake. A creature that successfully saves against the effect is immune to this jackalwere's gaze for the next 24 hours.
Undead and creatures immune to being {@condition charmed} aren't affected by it.

reaction.name: Vexing Howl {@recharge 4}
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of the jackalwere, is visible to the jackalwere, and can hear the jackalwere makes an attack roll but before the outcome is determined, the jackalwere can impose disadvantage to the creature's attack roll. If the attack misses, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Charisma saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 3d8}) psychic damage and is knocked {@condition prone}.

immune.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The jackalwere can use its action to polymorph into a specifc Medium human or a jackal-humanoid hybrid, or back into its true form (that of a Small jackal). Other than its size, its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The jackalwere has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The jackalwere has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the warhound's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The jackalwere deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the jackalwere that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the jackalwere doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Bite ( Jackal or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Scimitar (Human or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Sleep Gaze
entries: The jackalwere gazes at one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 10} Wisdom saving throw.

On a failed save, the target succumbs to a magical slumber, falling {@condition unconscious} for 10 minutes or until someone uses an action to shake the target awake. A creature that successfully saves against the effect is immune to this jackalwere's gaze for the next 24 hours.
Undead and creatures immune to being {@condition charmed} aren't affected by it.

monster.name: Kenku Eagle Claw
languages: understands Auran and Common but speaks only through the use of its Mimicry trait

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: The kenku has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The kenku has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Stunning Strike (3/Day)
entries: Once per turn, when the kenku hits a creature with a melee weapon attack, it can force the creature to make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of the creature's next turn.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While the kenku is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Wisdom modifer.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kenku makes three attacks, each of which can be an unarmed strike or a dart attack.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

monster.name: Kenku Gang Boss

trait.name: Ambusher

trait.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of its turns, the kenku can take the {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Ganglord's Presence
entries: A kenku ally that starts its turn with 30 feet of this kenku and can see and hear this kenku deals an extra 3 ({@dice 1d6}) damage on its weapon damage rolls against a creature if at least two of the kenku's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The kenku has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The kenku deals an extra 10 ({@dice 3d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the kenku that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and the kenku doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kenku makes two shortsword attacks or two shortbow attacks.

trait.name: Lightfooted
entries: The kobold can take the {@action Dash} or {@action Disengage} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the kobold has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The kobold has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the kobold's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Skirmish Advantage
entries: The kobold gains advantage on its first attack roll this turn if it has moved at least 15 feet from its space at the beginning of its turn.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Otherworldly Perception
entries: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is {@condition invisible} or on the Ethereal Plane It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

trait.name: Slippery
entries: The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Pincer Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). Until this grapple ends, the kuo-toa can't use its pincer staff on another target.

trait.name: Thunder Strike (5/Day)
entries: Once per turn, when the kuo-toa hits a creature with a melee weapon attack, it can force the creature to make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) thunder damage and is {@condition stunned} until the end of the creature's next turn, or half as much damage and isn't {@condition stunned} on a successful one.

trait.name: Water Whip (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the kuo-toa targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The creature must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 27 ({@damage 5d10}) bludgeoning damage, and the kuotoa can choose to either knock it {@condition prone} or pull it up to 25 feet closer to it. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage, and doesn't get pulled or knocked {@condition prone}.
