monster.name: Wight Captain

resist.note: from nonmagical weapons that aren't silvered

languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the wight has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Distracting Strike (1/Turn)
entries: When the wight hits a creature with a weapon attack, the next attack roll against the target by an attacker other than the wight has advantage if the attack is made before the start of the wight's next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wight makes two longsword attacks or two longbow attacks. It can use its Life Drain in place of one longsword attack.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

A humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a zombie under the wight's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. The wight can have no more than twelve zombies under its control at one time.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Longbow

action.name: Maneuver Allies {@recharge 5}
entries: Up to four allies within 60 feet of this captain that can hear it can each use their reaction to move up to half their speed without provoking {@action opportunity attack|phb|opportunity attacks}.

reaction.name: Directed Strike (3/Day)
entries: When a creature the wight can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll, and the creature can hear the wight, the wight grants advantage to that roll.

monster.name: Wight Champion

headerEntries: The wight is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). It has the following paladin spells prepared, and requires no spell components:

entries: The wight rerolls a failed saving throw. It must use the new roll.

If the wight expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra necrotic damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each level above 1st (maximum {@dice 5d8}).

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the wight has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Turn Resistance

The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage, or 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

headerEntries: The wight is an 11th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:

trait.name: Hexblade's Curse (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, the wight targets a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target is cursed for 1 minute. The curse ends early if the target dies, the wight dies, or it is {@condition incapacitated}. Until the curse ends, the wight gains the following benefits:

items: It deals an extra 3 damage on damage rolls against the cursed target.
Any attack roll it makes against the cursed target is a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the {@dice d20}.
If the cursed target dies, the hex knight regains 14 hit points.

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the wight has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The yeti has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

entries: The yeti targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see the yeti, the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw against this magic or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage and then be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute, unless it is immune to cold damage. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If the target's saving throw is successful, or if the effect ends on it, the target is immune to the Chilling Gaze of all yetis (but not abominable yetis) for 1 hour.

headerEntries: The yochlol's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 19}). The marilith general can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

trait.name: Rapid Shapechanger
entries: The yochlol elder can use a bonus action to polymorph into a form that resembles a female drow or giant spider, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Maddening Webs
entries: A creature that starts its turn in a space filled with webbing conjured by the yochlol elder's web spell takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The yochlol has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The yochlol can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Walking
entries: The yochlol ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The yochlol makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Slam (Bite in Spider Form)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft. (15 ft. in demon form), one target. {@h}8 ({@dice 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning (piercing in spider form) damage plus 28 ({@damage 8d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Amorphous Flurry (Demon Form only) {@recharge 5}
entries: The yochlol makes four slam attacks.

action.name: Noxious Mist Form
entries: The yochlol transforms into toxic mist or reverts to its true form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is also transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

While in mist form, the yochlol is {@condition incapacitated} and can't speak. It has a flying speed of 30 feet, can hover, and can pass through any space that isn't airtight. It has advantage on Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution saving throws, and it is immune to nonmagical damage.

While in mist form, the yochlol can enter a creature's space and stop there. Each time that creature starts its turn with the yochlol in its space, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage and be {@condition poisoned} until the start of its next turn. Until this poison ends, the target is {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The yochlol elder teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales fire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 59 ({@damage 17d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Ice Walk
entries: The dragon can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra moment.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) cold damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Cold Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales an icy blast in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, taking 49 ({@damage 11d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The behir makes two attacks: one with its bite and one to constrict.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) percing damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage. The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}) if the behir isn't already constricting a creature, and the target is {@condition restrained} until this grapple ends.

action.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The behir exhales a line of lightning that is 15 feet long and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 49 ({@damage 9d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The skeleton makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The dragon turtle can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon turtle makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws. It can use its tail attack in place of its two claws attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away from the dragon turtle and knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Steam Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales scalding steam in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 13d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Being underwater doesn't grant resistance.

immune.note: from nonmagical weapons

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The kraken can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Freedom of Movement
entries: The kraken ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be {@condition restrained}. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being {@condition grappled}.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The kraken deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The kraken makes three tentacle attacks, each of which it can replace with one use of Fling.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d8 + 8}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by the kraken, that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the kraken, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the kraken's turns. If the kraken takes 25 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the kraken must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the kraken. If the kraken dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 10 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 18}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. The kraken has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

action.name: Fling
entries: One Large or smaller object held or creature {@condition grappled} by the kraken is thrown up to 40 feet in a random direction and knocked {@condition prone}. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Lightning Storm
entries: The kraken magically creates three bolts of lightning, each of which can strike a target the kraken can see within 120 feet of it. A target must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 11 ({@damage 2d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Tentacle Attack or Fling
entries: The kraken makes one tentacle attack or uses its Fling.

legendary.name: Lightning Storm (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The kraken uses Lightning

legendary.name: Ink Cloud (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: While underwater, the kraken expels an ink cloud in a 40-foot radius. The cloud spreads around corners, and that area is heavily obscured to creatures other than the kraken. Each creature other than the kraken that ends its turn there must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, taking 16 ({@damage 3d10}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A strong current disperses the cloud, which otherwise disappears at the end of the kraken's next turn.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The worm makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its stinger.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the worm. A swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the worm, and it takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the worm's turns.

If the worm takes 20 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the worm must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the worm.
If the worm dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 5 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tail Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The roc has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The roc makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its talons.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) piercing damage, slashing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the roc can't use its talons on another target.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Abomination Form Only)
headerEntries: The yuan-ti's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). The yuan-ti can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The yuan-ti is a 17th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). It has the following paladin spells prepared:

trait.name: Indomitable (2/Day)
entries: The yuan-ti rerolls a failed saving throw. It must use the new roll.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The yuan-ti can use its action to polymorph into a Large snake, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It doesn't change form if it dies.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Smite (1/Turn)
entries: As a bonus action, when the yuan-ti hits a creature with a weapon attack, it can expend a 1st level spell slot to deal {@damage 2d8} radiant or necrotic damage to the target. If the yuan-ti expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each level above 1st (maximum {@dice 5d8}).

action.name: Multiattack (Abomination Form Only)
entries: The yuan-ti makes two ranged attacks or three melee attacks, but can use its bite and constrict attacks only once each.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the yuan-ti can't constrict another target

action.name: Scimitar (Abomination Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow (Abomination Form Only)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) piercing damage

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Abomination Form Only)
headerEntries: The yuan-ti's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}). The yuan-ti can innately cast the following spells, without providing material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The yuan-ti is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 13}). It has the following ranger spells prepared:

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The yuan-ti can use its action to polymorph into a Large snake, or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It doesn't change form if it dies.

trait.name: Jungle Strider
entries: Moving through nonmagical difficult jungle terrain doesn't cost the yuan-ti extra movement.

trait.name: Stealthy
entries: On each of its turns, the yuan-ti can use a bonus action to take the {@action Hide} action.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Slay Foe (1/Turn)
entries: The yuan-ti deals an extra 13 ({@dice 3d8}) damage with its weapon attack if it hits a creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

action.name: Multiattack (Abomination Form Only)
entries: The yuan-ti makes two ranged attacks or two melee attacks, but can can constrict only once.

action.name: Bite (Snake Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the yuan-ti can't constrict another target

action.name: Scimitar (Yuan-ti Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow (Abomination Form Only)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: The shambling mound explodes when it drops to 0 hit points. Each creature within 20 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 28 ({@damage 8d6}) poison damage and become infected with a disease on a failed save. Creatures immune to the {@condition poisoned} condition are immune to this disease.

Spores invade an infected creature's system, killing the creature in a number of hours equal to {@dice 1d12} + the creature's Constitution score, unless the disease is removed. In half that time, the creature becomes {@condition poisoned} for the rest of the duration. After the creature dies, it sprouts {@dice 2d4} Tiny gas spores that grow to full size in 7 days.

trait.name: Lightning Absorption
entries: Whenever the shambling mound is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The shambling mound makes two slam attacks. If both attacks hit a Medium or smaller target, the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}), and the shambling mound uses its Engulf on it.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Engulf
entries: The shambling mound engulfs a Medium or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by it. The engulfed target is {@condition blinded}, {@condition restrained}, and unable to breathe, and it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw at the start of each of the mound's turns or take 14 ({@dice 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) poison damage. If the mound moves, the engulfed target moves with it. The mound can have only one creature engulfed at a time.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the violet fungus remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary fungus.

action.name: Death Burst
entries: The shrieker explodes when it drops to 0 hit points. Each creature within 20 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage and become infected with a disease on a failed save. Creatures immune to the {@condition poisoned} condition are immune to this disease.

Spores invade an infected creature's system, killing the creature in a number of hours equal to {@dice 1d12} + the creature's Constitution score, unless the disease is removed. In half that time, the creature becomes {@condition poisoned} for the rest of the duration. After the creature dies, it sprouts {@dice 2d4} Tiny gas spores that grow to full size in 7 days.

reaction.name: Shriek
entries: When bright light or a creature is within 30 feet of the shrieker, it emits a shriek audible within 300 feet of it. The shrieker continues to shriek until the disturbance moves out of range and for {@dice 1d4} of the shrieker's turns afterward.

variantrule.name: Blight Land
entries: Below is the list of {@class druid|phb|circle spells|Land|phb} available to the circle druid who gains access to the Blight land type.

entries.caption: Blight
rows: {@spell Melf's acid arrow}, {@spell ray of enfeeblement}

variantrule.name: Frost Domain
entries: Below is the list of {@class cleric|phb|domain spells} available to the cleric who has chosen the Frost domain as their divine domain.

entries.caption: Frost Domain Spells
rows: {@spell gust of wind}, {@spell Snilloc's Snowball Swarm|xge}
